title: Canada Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Canada decreased to 285.30 percent in 2021 from 305.10 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Canada averaged 221.69 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 305.10 percent in 2020 and a record low of 175.60 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
